user_question: How can blockchain technology be used to ensure the authenticity of digital art?
final_answer: Blockchain technology can ensure the authenticity of digital art by creating a tamper-proof digital certificate of authenticity that is stored on the blockchain, providing a transparent and immutable record of ownership and provenance.
